TopicTitle: GAME WONT SHOW MY SAVED GAME IN RESUME MENU

Articles.Content: guys, downloaded a mod, opened my ksp, RESUME GAME IS EMPTY, my game i had was called "default" but its still in my save directory in ksp, tried to create a new game called "default" says that i mights overwrite data so nope, pls help, u will save 100 hours gameplay please..

Hi Seth,

Sorry to hear you're having a problem.  Please review this post (it's "stickied", you can see it at the top of the forum list) about how to get support for modded installs:

There are plenty of folks here on the forum who can help users with all kinds of problems-- but they can't help you unless you provide certain basic pieces of information.  The post I link to above should help get you started.

Also, just a friendly piece of advice-- avoid posting messages (especially thread titles) in ALL CAPITAL LETTERS, it tends to be interpreted as shouting and is unhelpful.
There is an issue where menus break in general, check if the settings options on the main menu work to see if the problem is with the menus or the save itself.
